title: Seersight Half-Elf
entryLore: The Mark of Detection grants those who bear it powers of observation and insight. House Medani carries this mark, using its abilities to provide bodyguard services, inquisitive work, and threat assessment. Half-elves with the Mark of Detection are prized for their ability to perceive danger and uncover secrets, making them excellent investigators, spies, and protectors.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have [[advantage]] on saving throws against being [[charmed]], and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Deductive Intuition
traits.description: When you make an Intelligence ([[investigation|Investigation]]) or Wisdom ([[insight|Insight]]) check, you can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the ability check.

traits.name: Magical Detection
traits.description: You can cast the [[detect_magic|Detect Magic]] and [[detect_poison_and_disease|Detect Poison and Disease]] spells with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast the [[see_invisibility|See Invisibility]] spell with it. Once you cast any of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]]. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells, and you don't require material components for them.

traits.name: Spells of the Mark
traits.description: If you have the Spellcasting or Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Detection Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.
